title: Chromecast with Google TV, almost two years later – Poorly aging hardware betrays the good OS
content:
It’s been almost two years since Google revealed its updated take on Android TV – and its first streamer with a remote. The Chromecast with Google TV ushered in a new era for the company’s streaming endeavors, but as we continue to move forward, time hasn’t been particularly kind to the Chromecast, and we’re itching to see what’s next for Google’s vision.

more…

The post Chromecast with Google TV, almost two years later – Poorly aging hardware betrays the good OS appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Two years after its debut, Chromecast with Google TV is aging poorly, and it's clear something in Google's lineup needs to change soon.
